alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:15PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 3 to 6 inches over the mountains. Gusty northwesterly wind of 10 to 15 mph with gusts to 25 possible through midnight. * WHERE...Owyhee Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The combination of snow and gusty winds will result in reduced visibility on roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
